å®ç° compose å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼ koa ä¸­é—´ä»¶æ´‹è‘±æ¨¡å‹ â€‹

js
const middleware = []
middleware.push((next) => {
  console.log(1)
  next()
  console.log(1.1)
})
middleware.push((next) => {
  console.log(2)
  next()
  console.log(2.1)
})
middleware.push((next) => {
  console.log(3)
  next()
  console.log(3.1)
})

const fn = compose(middleware)
fn() // 1 - 2 - 3 - 3.1 - 2.1 - 1.1

  console.log(1)

  console.log(1.1)

  console.log(3.1)

compose å‡½æ•°å®ç°

js
// ä¸æ˜¯ promise å®ç°
const compose = (middleware) => {
  return () => {
    const dispatch = (i) => {
      if (i === middleware.length) {
        return
      }
      const fn = middleware[i]
      const next = () => {
        // åœ¨ next() çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä¸­é—´ä»¶å‡½æ•°
        dispatch(i + 1)
      }
      fn(next)
    }
    dispatch(0)
  }
}

// koa2 æ¡†æ¶çš„ä¸­é—´ä»¶å®ç°åŸç†
function compose (middleware) {
  // æå‰åˆ¤æ–­ä¸­é—´ä»¶ç±»å‹,é˜²æ­¢åç»­é”™è¯¯
  if (!Array.isArray(middleware)) throw new TypeError('Middleware stack must be an array!')
  for (const fn of middleware) {
    // ä¸­é—´ä»¶å¿…é¡»ä¸ºå‡½æ•°ç±»å‹
    if (typeof fn !== 'function') throw new TypeError('Middleware must be composed of functions!')
  }
  return function (context, next) {
    // é‡‡ç”¨é—­åŒ…å°†ç´¢å¼•ç¼“å­˜,æ¥å®ç°è°ƒç”¨è®¡æ•°
    let index = -1
    return dispatch(0)
    function dispatch (i) {
      // é˜²æ­¢next()æ–¹æ³•é‡å¤è°ƒç”¨
      if (i <= index) return Promise.reject(new Error('next() called multiple times'))
      index = i
      let fn = middleware[i]
      if (i === middleware.length) fn = next
      if (!fn) return Promise.resolve()
      try {
        // åŒ…è£…next()è¿”å›å€¼ä¸ºPromiseå¯¹è±¡
        return Promise.resolve(fn(context, dispatch.bind(null, i + 1)));
      } catch (err) {
        // å¼‚å¸¸å¤„ç†
        return Promise.reject(err)
      }
    }
  }
}
// ä¸æ˜¯ promise å®ç°
const compose = (middleware) => {
  return () => {
    const dispatch = (i) => {
      if (i === middleware.length) {
        return
      }
      const fn = middleware[i]
      const next = () => {
        // åœ¨ next() çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä¸­é—´ä»¶å‡½æ•°
        dispatch(i + 1)
      }
      fn(next)
    }
    dispatch(0)
  }
}

// koa2 æ¡†æ¶çš„ä¸­é—´ä»¶å®ç°åŸç†
function compose (middleware) {
  // æå‰åˆ¤æ–­ä¸­é—´ä»¶ç±»å‹,é˜²æ­¢åç»­é”™è¯¯
  if (!Array.isArray(middleware)) throw new TypeError('Middleware stack must be an array!')
  for (const fn of middleware) {
    // ä¸­é—´ä»¶å¿…é¡»ä¸ºå‡½æ•°ç±»å‹
    if (typeof fn !== 'function') throw new TypeError('Middleware must be composed of functions!')
  }
  return function (context, next) {
    // é‡‡ç”¨é—­åŒ…å°†ç´¢å¼•ç¼“å­˜,æ¥å®ç°è°ƒç”¨è®¡æ•°
    let index = -1
    return dispatch(0)
    function dispatch (i) {
      // é˜²æ­¢next()æ–¹æ³•é‡å¤è°ƒç”¨
      if (i <= index) return Promise.reject(new Error('next() called multiple times'))
      index = i
      let fn = middleware[i]
      if (i === middleware.length) fn = next
      if (!fn) return Promise.resolve()
      try {
        // åŒ…è£…next()è¿”å›å€¼ä¸ºPromiseå¯¹è±¡
        return Promise.resolve(fn(context, dispatch.bind(null, i + 1)));
      } catch (err) {
        // å¼‚å¸¸å¤„ç†
        return Promise.reject(err)
      }
    }
  }
}

const vnode = {
  tag: 'DIV',
  attrs: {
    id: 'app'
  },
  children: [
    {
      tag: 'SPAN',
      children: [
        {
          tag: 'A',
          children: ['router', 'link']
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      tag: 'SPAN',
      children: [
        {
          tag: 'A',
          children: ['go']
        },
        {
          tag: 'A',
          children: []
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

å…³é”® api

  • document.createElement(tagName) æ–°å»º dom
  • ele.setAttribute(attr, value) è®¾ç½® attr å±æ€§
  • parent.appendChild(ele) å­å…ƒç´ æ”¾ç½®
js
const render = (vnode) => {
  const toDom = (node, parent = null) => {
    // æ–‡æœ¬
    if (typeof node === 'string' && parent) {
      parent.innerText += node
      return parent
    }
    // æ ‡ç­¾
    const { tag, attrs, children } = node
    const ele = document.createElement(tag.toLowerCase())
    // å¤„ç† attrs
    if (attrs) {
      Object.keys(attrs).forEach(key => {
        ele.setAttribute(key, attrs[key])
      })
    }
    // å¤„ç† å­å…ƒç´ 
    if (children && children.length) {
      children.forEach(child => {
        toDom(child, ele)
      })
    }
    // çˆ¶çº§æŒ‚è½½
    if (parent) {
      parent.appendChild(ele)
    } else {
      parent = ele
    }

    return parent
  }

  const dom = toDom(vnode)
  return dom
}

// æµ‹è¯•
render(vnode)
const render = (vnode) => {
  const toDom = (node, parent = null) => {
    // æ–‡æœ¬
    if (typeof node === 'string' && parent) {
      parent.innerText += node
      return parent
    }
    // æ ‡ç­¾
    const { tag, attrs, children } = node
    const ele = document.createElement(tag.toLowerCase())
    // å¤„ç† attrs
    if (attrs) {
      Object.keys(attrs).forEach(key => {
        ele.setAttribute(key, attrs[key])
      })
    }
    // å¤„ç† å­å…ƒç´ 
    if (children && children.length) {
      children.forEach(child => {
        toDom(child, ele)
      })
    }
    // çˆ¶çº§æŒ‚è½½
    if (parent) {
      parent.appendChild(ele)
    } else {
      parent = ele
    }

    return parent
  }

  const dom = toDom(vnode)
  return dom
}

// æµ‹è¯•
render(vnode)

ç‰ˆæœ¬å·æ’åº â€‹

è¾“å…¥ä¸€ç»„ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºä»å¤§åˆ°å°çš„æ’åº

js
const versions = ['2.1.0.1', '0.402.1', '10.2.1', '5.1.2', '1.0.4.5']

const versionSort = (list) => {
  return list.sort((v1, v2) => {
    let i = 0
    const arr1 = v1.split('.')
    const arr2 = v2.split('.')
    while(true) {
      // å–å‡ºåŒä½ç½®æ•°å­—
      const s1 = arr1[i]
      const s2 = arr2[i]
      i++
      // å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªå°ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ç©ºäº†ï¼Œåˆ™æ¯”è¾ƒå®Œæ¯•
      if (s1 === undefined || s2 === undefined) {
        return arr2.length - arr1.length
      }
      // ç›¸åŒåˆ™ç»§ç»­å¯¹æ¯”ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå°ç‰ˆæœ¬å·
      if (s1 === s2) continue
      // å¦åˆ™æ¯”è¾ƒ å°ç‰ˆæœ¬æ•°å­—å¤§å°
      return s2 - s1
    }
  })
}

versionSort(versions) // Â ['10.2.1', '5.1.2', '2.1.0.1', '1.0.4.5', '0.402.1']
const versions = ['2.1.0.1', '0.402.1', '10.2.1', '5.1.2', '1.0.4.5']

const versionSort = (list) => {
  return list.sort((v1, v2) => {
    let i = 0
    const arr1 = v1.split('.')
    const arr2 = v2.split('.')
    while(true) {
      // å–å‡ºåŒä½ç½®æ•°å­—
      const s1 = arr1[i]
      const s2 = arr2[i]
      i++
      // å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªå°ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ç©ºäº†ï¼Œåˆ™æ¯”è¾ƒå®Œæ¯•
      if (s1 === undefined || s2 === undefined) {
        return arr2.length - arr1.length
      }
      // ç›¸åŒåˆ™ç»§ç»­å¯¹æ¯”ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå°ç‰ˆæœ¬å·
      if (s1 === s2) continue
      // å¦åˆ™æ¯”è¾ƒ å°ç‰ˆæœ¬æ•°å­—å¤§å°
      return s2 - s1
    }
  })
}

versionSort(versions) // Â ['10.2.1', '5.1.2', '2.1.0.1', '1.0.4.5', '0.402.1']

æ•°ç»„ è½¬ æ ‘ â€‹

ä½¿ç”¨ map æ¥ç¼“å­˜ id å’Œ å¯¹åº”çš„æ•°ç»„å…ƒç´  id -> treeItem ï¼Œ éå†æ—¶åˆ¤æ–­ map ä¸­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ parentId å¯¹åº”çš„ id ï¼Œ å­˜åœ¨åˆ™å°† treeItem ä¿å­˜åˆ° parentItem.children ä¸­

js
const list = [
  { id: 1, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨A', parentId: 0 },
  { id: 2, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨B', parentId: 1 },
  { id: 3, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨C', parentId: 1 },
  { id: 4, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨D', parentId: 2 },
  { id: 5, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨E', parentId: 3 },
  { id: 6, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨F', parentId: 3 },
];

const convertArrToTree = (arr) => {
  let root = null;
  const idMap = new Map();
  arr.forEach((item) => {
    // tree item
    const { id, parentId, name } = item;
    const treeItem = { id, name };
    // ç¼“å­˜
    idMap.set(id, treeItem);
    // æ‰¾åˆ° parent å¹¶ push åˆ° children
    const parentItem = idMap.get(parentId);
    if (parentItem) {
      if (parentItem.children === undefined) {
        parentItem.children = [];
      }
      parentItem.children.push(treeItem);
    }

    // æ˜¯æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è¯èµ‹å€¼ç»™ root
    if (parentId === 0) {
      root = treeItem;
    }
  });
  return root;
}

console.log(convertArrToTree(list));
const list = [
  { id: 1, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨A', parentId: 0 },
  { id: 2, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨B', parentId: 1 },
  { id: 3, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨C', parentId: 1 },
  { id: 4, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨D', parentId: 2 },
  { id: 5, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨E', parentId: 3 },
  { id: 6, name: 'éƒ¨é—¨F', parentId: 3 },
];

const convertArrToTree = (arr) => {
  let root = null;
  const idMap = new Map();
  arr.forEach((item) => {
    // tree item
    const { id, parentId, name } = item;
    const treeItem = { id, name };
    // ç¼“å­˜
    idMap.set(id, treeItem);
    // æ‰¾åˆ° parent å¹¶ push åˆ° children
    const parentItem = idMap.get(parentId);
    if (parentItem) {
      if (parentItem.children === undefined) {
        parentItem.children = [];
      }
      parentItem.children.push(treeItem);
    }

    // æ˜¯æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è¯èµ‹å€¼ç»™ root
    if (parentId === 0) {
      root = treeItem;
    }
  });
  return root;
}

console.log(convertArrToTree(list));

æ’åº â€‹

å†’æ³¡æ’åº â€‹

ä¸¤å±‚éå†ï¼Œæ³¨æ„éå†èŒƒå›´ï¼Œç›¸é‚»å…ƒç´ è¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒäº¤æ¢ä½ç½®

å¤æ‚åº¦ O(nÂ²) ï¼Œç¨³å®šæ’åºç®—æ³•

js
const list = [2, 4, 1, 666, 23, 12, 67, 99]

const bubbleSort = (arr) => {
  // å¤–å±‚ éå† æ§åˆ¶æ’åºè¿›è¡Œå¤šå°‘è½®
  for(let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    // å†…å±‚ éå† æ§åˆ¶ç›¸é‚»çš„æ•°æ®æ¯”è¾ƒ
    for(let j = 0; j < arr.length - i - 1; j++) {
      if (arr[j] > arr[j + 1]) {
        // å‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”åä¸€ä¸ªå¤§ï¼Œåˆ™äº¤æ¢ä½ç½®
        [arr[j], arr[j + 1]] = [arr[j + 1], arr[j]]
      }
    }
  }
  return arr
}
const list = [2, 4, 1, 666, 23, 12, 67, 99]

const bubbleSort = (arr) => {
  // å¤–å±‚ éå† æ§åˆ¶æ’åºè¿›è¡Œå¤šå°‘è½®
  for(let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    // å†…å±‚ éå† æ§åˆ¶ç›¸é‚»çš„æ•°æ®æ¯”è¾ƒ
    for(let j = 0; j < arr.length - i - 1; j++) {
      if (arr[j] > arr[j + 1]) {
        // å‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”åä¸€ä¸ªå¤§ï¼Œåˆ™äº¤æ¢ä½ç½®
        [arr[j], arr[j + 1]] = [arr[j + 1], arr[j]]
      }
    }
  }
  return arr
}

é€‰æ‹©æ’åº â€‹

ä¸¤å±‚éå†ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡éå†æ‰¾åˆ°å‰©ä½™å…ƒç´ ä¸­çš„æœ€å°å€¼ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©æœ€å°å€¼æ’åˆ°å·²æ’åºçš„å…ƒç´ åé¢

å¤æ‚åº¦ O(nÂ²) ï¼Œä¸ç¨³å®šæ’åºç®—æ³•

js
const list = [2, 4, 1, 666, 23, 12, 67, 99]

const selectSort = (arr) => {
  // å‰©ä½™ä¸­æœ€å°å€¼çš„ä¸‹æ ‡
  let minIndex
  // å¤–å±‚ éå† æ§åˆ¶æ’åºè¿›è¡Œå¤šå°‘è½®
  for(let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    minIndex = i
    // ä»å½“å‰æŒ‡é’ˆå¼€å§‹ æ‰¾å°äºå½“å‰çš„ æœ€å°çš„ å€¼
    for(let j = i + 1; j < arr.length; j++) {
      if (arr[j] < arr[minIndex]) {
        // éå†æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€å°çš„å€¼çš„ä¸‹æ ‡
        minIndex = j
      }
    }
    // å¦‚æœå‰©ä½™æœ€å°å€¼çš„ä¸‹æ ‡ä¸æ˜¯å½“å‰æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œåˆ™äº¤æ¢
    if (minIndex !== i) {
      [arr[i], arr[minIndex]] = [arr[minIndex], arr[i]]
    }
  }
  return arr
}
const list = [2, 4, 1, 666, 23, 12, 67, 99]

const selectSort = (arr) => {
  // å‰©ä½™ä¸­æœ€å°å€¼çš„ä¸‹æ ‡
  let minIndex
  // å¤–å±‚ éå† æ§åˆ¶æ’åºè¿›è¡Œå¤šå°‘è½®
  for(let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    minIndex = i
    // ä»å½“å‰æŒ‡é’ˆå¼€å§‹ æ‰¾å°äºå½“å‰çš„ æœ€å°çš„ å€¼
    for(let j = i + 1; j < arr.length; j++) {
      if (arr[j] < arr[minIndex]) {
        // éå†æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€å°çš„å€¼çš„ä¸‹æ ‡
        minIndex = j
      }
    }
    // å¦‚æœå‰©ä½™æœ€å°å€¼çš„ä¸‹æ ‡ä¸æ˜¯å½“å‰æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œåˆ™äº¤æ¢
    if (minIndex !== i) {
      [arr[i], arr[minIndex]] = [arr[minIndex], arr[i]]
    }
  }
  return arr
}

æ’å…¥æ’åº â€‹

å–å‰©ä½™å…ƒç´ ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä½œä¸ºç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¾€å‰éå†å·²æ’åºçš„å…ƒç´ å¹¶ç§»åŠ¨ï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ°æ¯”ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ å°çš„ï¼Œåˆ™æ’å…¥åˆ°ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ åé¢

å¤æ‚åº¦ O(nÂ²) ï¼Œç¨³å®šæ’åº

js
const list = [2, 4, 1, 666, 23, 12, 67, 99]

const insertSort = (arr) => {
  // ä»ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¼€å§‹éå†
  for (let i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) {
    let p = i
    // è®°å½•è¦æ’å…¥çš„ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ 
    const target = arr[p]
    // ä» target æ‰€åœ¨ä½ç½®å‘å‰éå†ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ å°çš„ï¼Œç„¶åæ’åœ¨åé¢
    while(p > 0 && arr[p - 1] > target) {
      // ç§»åŠ¨å‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ åˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®
      arr[p] = arr[p - 1]
      p--
    }
    arr[p] = target
  }
  return arr
}
const list = [2, 4, 1, 666, 23, 12, 67, 99]

const insertSort = (arr) => {
  // ä»ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¼€å§‹éå†
  for (let i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) {
    let p = i
    // è®°å½•è¦æ’å…¥çš„ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ 
    const target = arr[p]
    // ä» target æ‰€åœ¨ä½ç½®å‘å‰éå†ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ å°çš„ï¼Œç„¶åæ’åœ¨åé¢
    while(p > 0 && arr[p - 1] > target) {
      // ç§»åŠ¨å‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ åˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®
      arr[p] = arr[p - 1]
      p--
    }
    arr[p] = target
  }
  return arr
}

å¿«é€Ÿæ’åº â€‹

ä½¿ç”¨é€’å½’ï¼Œå°†ä¸­é—´å…ƒç´ æ”¾ç½®åœ¨æ–°æ•°ç»„ä¸­é—´ï¼Œæ¯”ä¸­é—´å…ƒç´ å¤§çš„æ”¾å³è¾¹ï¼Œå°çš„æ”¾å·¦è¾¹

æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º O(nlogn) ï¼Œä¸ç¨³å®šæ’åº

js
const list = [2, 4, 1, 666, 23, 12, 67, 99]

const quickSort = (arr) => {
  // é€’å½’ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶
  if (arr.length <= 1) return arr
  // ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹
  const mid = Math.floor(arr.length / 2)
  // ä»¥ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºåŸºå‡†ï¼Œæ¯”ä¸­é—´å¤§çš„æ”¾ right ï¼Œå°çš„ æ”¾ left
  const base = arr.splice(mid, 1)[0] // å…ˆç§»é™¤ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹
  const left = [], right = []
  for (const item of arr) {
    if (item > base) {
      right.push(item)
    } else {
      left.push(item)
    }
  }
  // é€’å½’ï¼Œé‡æ–°ç»„åˆæ•°ç»„ï¼Œbase é‡æ–°æ”¾ç½®åœ¨ ä¸­é—´
  return [...quickSort(left), base, ...quickSort(right)]
}
const list = [2, 4, 1, 666, 23, 12, 67, 99]

const quickSort = (arr) => {
  // é€’å½’ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶
  if (arr.length <= 1) return arr
  // ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹
  const mid = Math.floor(arr.length / 2)
  // ä»¥ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºåŸºå‡†ï¼Œæ¯”ä¸­é—´å¤§çš„æ”¾ right ï¼Œå°çš„ æ”¾ left
  const base = arr.splice(mid, 1)[0] // å…ˆç§»é™¤ä¸­é—´èŠ‚ç‚¹
  const left = [], right = []
  for (const item of arr) {
    if (item > base) {
      right.push(item)
    } else {
      left.push(item)
    }
  }
  // é€’å½’ï¼Œé‡æ–°ç»„åˆæ•°ç»„ï¼Œbase é‡æ–°æ”¾ç½®åœ¨ ä¸­é—´
  return [...quickSort(left), base, ...quickSort(right)]
}

æ‰“ä¹±æ•°ç»„ - æ´—ç‰Œç®—æ³• â€‹

é•¿åº¦ä¸º n çš„æ•°ç»„çš„å…¨æ’åˆ—æœ‰ n! ç§ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´æ‰“ä¹±ç»“æœæ€»å…±æœ‰ n! ç§ã€‚

æ´—ç‰Œç®—æ³•ï¼Œäº§ç”Ÿçš„ç»“æœå¿…é¡»æœ‰ n! ç§å¯èƒ½ï¼Œå¦åˆ™æ— æ³•åšåˆ°çœŸçš„æ‰“ä¹±äº†ã€‚

js
const nums = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
const shuffle = (arr) => {
  const n = arr.length
  for (let i = 0; i < n; i++) {
    const r = Math.floor(i + Math.random() * (n - i))
    const t = arr[i]
    arr[i] = arr[r]
    arr[r] = t
  }
  return arr
}
const nums = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
const shuffle = (arr) => {
  const n = arr.length
  for (let i = 0; i < n; i++) {
    const r = Math.floor(i + Math.random() * (n - i))
    const t = arr[i]
    arr[i] = arr[r]
    arr[r] = t
  }
  return arr
}

äºŒå‰æ ‘éå† â€‹

å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå† â€‹

é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼ˆå…ˆè¿›åå‡ºï¼‰ï¼Œ æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½éœ€å°†å·¦å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä»å³è¾¹å…¥é˜Ÿï¼Œéå†æ—¶ä»å·¦è¾¹å‡ºé˜Ÿ

js
const breadthFirst = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;
  // ç»´æŠ¤é˜Ÿåˆ—
  const stack = [root];
  while(stack.length) {
    // å‡ºé˜Ÿ
    const node = stack.shift();
    arr.push(node.val);
    // å…¥é˜Ÿ
    node.left && stack.push(node.left);
    node.right && stack.push(node.right);
  }
  return arr;
}
const breadthFirst = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;
  // ç»´æŠ¤é˜Ÿåˆ—
  const stack = [root];
  while(stack.length) {
    // å‡ºé˜Ÿ
    const node = stack.shift();
    arr.push(node.val);
    // å…¥é˜Ÿ
    node.left && stack.push(node.left);
    node.right && stack.push(node.right);
  }
  return arr;
}

const arr = [];
const depthFirst = (root) => {
  if (!root) return arr;
  arr.push(root.val);
  root.left && depthFirst(root.left);
  root.right && depthFirst(root.right);
}

å±‚åºéå† â€‹

é€’å½’ï¼Œæ³¨æ„è¦å…ˆéå†å®Œä¸€å±‚ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½è¿›è¡Œä¸‹ä¸€å±‚éå†ï¼Œè¿”å›å€¼åº”è¯¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«ç”¨äºå‚¨å­˜æ¯ä¸€å±‚çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼

js
const levelOrder = (root) => {
  const arr = []
  if (!root) return arr

  const stack = [root]
  while(stack.length) {
    let len = stack.length
    // ä¸€å±‚ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸´æ—¶å‚¨å­˜
    const tmp = []
    while(len--) {
      const node = stack.shift()
      tmp.push(node.val)
      // æŒ‰é¡ºåº å…¥é˜Ÿ
      node.left && stack.push(node.left)
      node.right && stack.push(node.right)
    }
    // éå†å®Œä¸€å±‚ï¼Œpush è¿› arr
    arr.push(tmp)
  }
}
const levelOrder = (root) => {
  const arr = []
  if (!root) return arr

  const stack = [root]
  while(stack.length) {
    let len = stack.length
    // ä¸€å±‚ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸´æ—¶å‚¨å­˜
    const tmp = []
    while(len--) {
      const node = stack.shift()
      tmp.push(node.val)
      // æŒ‰é¡ºåº å…¥é˜Ÿ
      node.left && stack.push(node.left)
      node.right && stack.push(node.right)
    }
    // éå†å®Œä¸€å±‚ï¼Œpush è¿› arr
    arr.push(tmp)
  }
}
